net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_addRoll
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Rollers use this to add the last roll to the RollExpression. The last roll added is considered the current roll. use json.set to override the "roll" key, preferably with a previously rolled value.
arg(0) = RollExpression arg(1) = roll
returns updated RollExpression
